title: State Dept's Krach, DNC Night 2, Jeff Weaver
itunes:title: State Dept's Krach, DNC Night 2, Jeff Weaver
description:
Guests: Tyler Pager, Bloomberg national politics reporter, Jeff Weaver, former Senior Advisor for Bernie Sanders 2020 campaign and former campaign manager for Bernie Sanders in 2016, Josh Galper, co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG and the law firm Davis, Goldberg & Galper, and a former DNC convention speechwriter, and Brian Darling, former Senior Communications Director for Sen. Rand Paul and Founder of Liberty Government Affairs.

Kevin also spoke to Keith Krach, U.S. Undersecretary of State for Economic Growth about the letter he sent asking colleges and universities to divest from Chinese holdings in their endowments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
